title: Let's make puppets
creator_credit: Australian Instructional Films and Children's Library and Crafts Movement
brief_description: Demonstrates a simple method of making puppets; materials for the “Melbourne Method”; construction of the head; making the hands; manipulation of puppets; puppets in action. Of historical interest.
